org.threadly.concurrent
Interface SimpleSchedulerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Executor
All Known Subinterfaces:
PrioritySchedulerInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcurrentSimpleSchedulerWrapper, NoThreadScheduler, PriorityScheduledExecutor, PriorityScheduledExecutorServiceWrapper, TestablePriorityScheduler
public interface SimpleSchedulerInterface
extends java.util.concurrent.Executor

A simple thread pool that accepts scheduling.

Method Summary
 boolean isShutdown()
          Function to check if the thread pool is currently accepting and handling tasks.

Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Executor
execute
 

Method Detail

schedule

void schedule(java.lang.Runnable task,
              long delayInMs)
Schedule a task with a given delay.

Parameters:
task - Task to execute
delayInMs - Time to wait to execute task

scheduleWithFixedDelay

void scheduleWithFixedDelay(java.lang.Runnable task,
                            long initialDelay,
                            long recurringDelay)
Schedule a recurring task to run. The recurring delay time will be from the point where execution finished.

Parameters:
task - Task to be executed.
initialDelay - Delay in milliseconds until first run.
recurringDelay - Delay in milliseconds for running task after last finish.

isShutdown

boolean isShutdown()
Function to check if the thread pool is currently accepting and handling tasks.

Returns:
true if thread pool is running
